sentences.sContent: Over 500 people died during last year’s flu epidemic.
sentences.sCn: 去年流感大暴发期间有五百多人死亡。

sentences.sContent: ...To call stress an epidemic isn't exaggeration...
...That explanation appeals to common sense and has dominated efforts to get to the root of the obesity epidemic and reverse it...
...have calculated that people kicking the habit have been responsible for a small but significant portion of the US epidemic of fatness...
...Supersize Surprise Ask anyone why there is an obesity epidemic and they will tell you that it’s al down to eating too much and burning too few calories...

synos.tran: 传染病；流行病；风尚等的流行

phrases.pCn: 防疫；疫病防治；流行病预防

words.tran: 流行病学的；传染病学的

trans.tranOther: a large number of cases of a disease that happen at the same time
